attributes.action: No income tax for key workers for next 3 months. Every frontline worker.
attributes.additional_details: This is to give this people a real appreciation. This people are scared and worried for their own health and putting their job first in this difficult time.
attributes.background: No to income tax key worker who are working and serving community. Like Doctors, Nurses, supermarket staff, council cleaners, bin collector, lorry and transport drivers etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
